articles.author: Emmanuel Felton
articles.title: In Jackson, Mississippi, a water crisis of unparalleled scale - The Washington Post
articles.description: Jackson, Mississippi, a city without safe drinking water, is facing a crisis unparalleled in modern American history.
articles.content:
(Video: Rory Doyle for The Washington Post)
Comment on this story
JACKSON, Miss. What stood out this week was the calm. The streets were quiet, and residents queued expectantly for resources.

articles.title: Afrobeats DJ competition kicks off - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: A United States of America-based disc jockey, Ekpeyong Otu, aka DJ MixMaster Brown, has announced the commencement of his annual afrobeats DJ Competition tagged, ‘Lords of The Mix’.
articles.content:

articles.author: Poulomi Ghosh
articles.title: Indian called 'parasite, genociding our race' in Poland; ‘Stop invading’: Watch - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The video emerges amid back-to-back hate incidents targetting Indians in the United States. This, however, took place in Poland but the attacker in the video identified him as an American and a ‘White'. | World News
articles.content: A fresh video of an Indian being racially abused allegedly by an American in Poland has surfaced on social media. The Indian whose identity has not yet been established was called a parasite, a genoc… [+1864 chars]
